//%attributes = {"lang":"en"} comment added and reserved by 4D.
// 
// GetPaymentDetailXmlString
// https://test.paymentxchange.com.au/PaymentExchange.asmx?WSDL
// 
// Method source code automatically generated by the 4D SOAP wizard.
// ----------------------------------------------------------------

C_TEXT($1)
C_TEXT($2)
C_TEXT($0)

C_TEXT($root)
C_TEXT($subelem)
C_TEXT($namespace;$oldErrMethod)

$oldErrMethod:=Method called on error
ON ERR CALL("Err_EziGetPaymentStatus")
gError:=""
$namespace:="https://px.ezidebit.com.au/"
$root:=DOM Create XML Ref("GetPaymentDetail";$namespace)

$subelem:=DOM Create XML element($root;"/GetPaymentDetail/DigitalKey")
DOM SET XML ELEMENT VALUE($subelem;$1)

$subelem:=DOM Create XML element($root;"/GetPaymentDetail/PaymentReference")
DOM SET XML ELEMENT VALUE($subelem;$2)

WEB SERVICE SET PARAMETER("XMLIn";$root)

DOM EXPORT TO VAR($root;$Message)
//SET TEXT TO PASTEBOARD($Message)
SyncRecordLog ("EziDebit GetPaymentDetails. Highlander: "+String([Facility]Highlander)+" Request: "+$Message)

If ([Facility]Highlander)
If ([Facility]TestAccount)
//WEB SERVICE CALL("https://test.paymentxchange.com.au/PaymentExchange.asmx";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/GetPaymentDetailXmlString";"GetPaymentDetailXmlString";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/";Web Service Manual)
WEB SERVICE CALL("https://api.demo.ezidebit.com.au/v3-5/nonpci";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/INonPCIService/GetPaymentDetail";"GetPaymentDetail";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/";Web Service manual)
Else 
//WEB SERVICE CALL("https://live.paymentxchange.com.au/PaymentExchange.asmx";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/GetPaymentDetailXmlString";"GetPaymentDetailXmlString";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/";Web Service Manual)
WEB SERVICE CALL("https://api.ezidebit.com.au/v3-5/nonpci";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/INonPCIService/GetPaymentDetail";"GetPaymentDetail";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/";Web Service manual)
End if 
Else 
If ([Facility]TestAccount)
//WEB SERVICE CALL("https://test.paymentxchange.com.au/PaymentExchange.asmx";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/GetPaymentDetailXmlString";"GetPaymentDetailXmlString";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/";Web Service Manual)
WEB SERVICE CALL("https://api.demo.ezidebit.com.au/v3-3/nonpci";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/INonPCIService/GetPaymentDetail";"GetPaymentDetail";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/";Web Service manual)
Else 
//WEB SERVICE CALL("https://live.paymentxchange.com.au/PaymentExchange.asmx";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/GetPaymentDetailXmlString";"GetPaymentDetailXmlString";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/";Web Service Manual)
WEB SERVICE CALL("https://api.ezidebit.com.au/v3-3/nonpci";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/INonPCIService/GetPaymentDetail";"GetPaymentDetail";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/";Web Service manual)
End if 
End if 



$EziResult:=Num(WEB SERVICE Get info(0))

If ($EziResult=0)
C_BLOB($blob)
C_TEXT($resroot)
C_TEXT($ressubelem;$PaymentID)
WEB SERVICE GET RESULT($blob;"XMLOut";*)
$text:=Convert to text($blob;"UTF-8")
$text:=Replace string($text;"&lt;";"<")
$text:=Replace string($text;"&gt;";">")
$resroot:=DOM Parse XML variable($text)

DOM EXPORT TO VAR($resroot;$Message)
//SET TEXT TO PASTEBOARD($Message)
SyncRecordLog ("EziDebit GetPaymentDetails Response: "+$Message)

//$ressubelem:=DOM Find XML element($resroot;"/GetPaymentDetailXmlStringResponse/GetPaymentDetailXmlStringResult/Payments/Payment/PaymentStatus")
$ressubelem:=DOM Find XML element($resroot;"/GetPaymentDetailResponse/GetPaymentDetailResult/Data/PaymentStatus")
DOM GET XML ELEMENT VALUE($ressubelem;$0)
If ($0="S")
//$ressubelem:=DOM Find XML element($resroot;"/GetPaymentDetailXmlStringResponse/GetPaymentDetailXmlStringResult/Payments/Payment/SettlementDate")
$ressubelem:=DOM Find XML element($resroot;"/GetPaymentDetailResponse/GetPaymentDetailResult/Data/SettlementDate")
DOM GET XML ELEMENT VALUE($ressubelem;$stringDate)

// 10/07/15 DAM Added for date banked
If ([Analysis]SetBankedDate=False)
[Trxs]DateBanked:=Date(Substring($stringDate;9;2)+"/"+Substring($stringDate;6;2)+"/"+Substring($stringDate;1;4))
End if 
If ([Trxs]OriginalReceipt="MDD") | ([Trxs]OriginalReceipt="")//10780
$ressubelem:=DOM Find XML element($resroot;"/GetPaymentDetailResponse/GetPaymentDetailResult/Data/PaymentID")
DOM GET XML ELEMENT VALUE($ressubelem;$PaymentID)
[Trxs]OriginalReceipt:=$PaymentID
vOriginalReceipt:=VTRANSID
VTRANSID:=[Trxs]OriginalReceipt
End if 

End if 

If ($0="F")
//$ressubelem:=DOM Find XML element($resroot;"/GetPaymentDetailXmlStringResponse/GetPaymentDetailXmlStringResult/Payments/Payment/BankFailedReason")
$ressubelem:=DOM Find XML element($resroot;"/GetPaymentDetailResponse/GetPaymentDetailResult/Data/BankFailedReason")
DOM GET XML ELEMENT VALUE($ressubelem;gError)
End if 

DOM CLOSE XML($resroot)

Else 
SyncRecordLog ("EziDebit GetPaymentDetails call result: "+String($EziResult)+" Message: "+gError)
End if 

DOM CLOSE XML($root)
ON ERR CALL($oldErrMethod)
